detail_desc: Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Wallet in grained leather with one note compartment, one zipped coin compartment and three card compartments. Size 8.5x11 cm.
Quilted, gently fitted, lightweight coat with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.

Narrow waist bag designed for running with a small but stretchy zipped compartment, an adjustable elastic strap with a plastic fastener, and reflective details. Compartment dimensions when empty 5x19.5 cm, when stretched approx. 9x19.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, side pockets and flap chest pockets. Seam with a drawstring and ties under the bust and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and knot detail at the front, and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with covered elastic at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Lined lower section.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Relaxed fit with a pleat at the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide lightly padded shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a rolled, raw-edge hem.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a scalloped lace trim around the neckline and armholes.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded jersey tongue and shimmering metallic heel caps. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. V-neck sweater vest in a textured wool knit with a ribbed hem and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
5-pocket, low-rise, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, short legs and press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Bucket hat in woven fabric with a decorative button on the top, an adjustable tab with a plastic fastener at the back and a cotton sweatband. Width of brim 6 cm.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with smocking and buttons at the cuffs.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.

Dungaree shorts in washed denim with adjustable straps with a press-stud and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides. Fake pockets and belt loops at the front, one back pocket and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Thin metal hoop earrings in various sizes with beads and pendants. Diameter from 1.7 cm to 2.6 cm.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Lined.
Fleece Santa suit with press-stud fastenings and a hat with a contrasting colour trim and fleece pompom on the top.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and a fake fly.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit.

Shirt in washed superstretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and embroidered details on one sleeve and at the hem. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a yoke with a pleat at the back.

Fully lined, batik-patterned swimsuit with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a deep V-neck and long ties at the back. High-cut legs with flounced trims at the sides, and medium coverage at the back. The polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Imitation leather sandals with fabric appliqués at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Set with a top and shorts. Jersey top with a print motif and short sleeves. Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Fully lined swimsuit with a low neckline front and back, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and concealed elastication under the bust. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the swimsuit lining is recycled.

Short, fitted underdress in microfibre with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an inner top with opening cups with space for nursing pads. The dress is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Ankle-length chinos in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a detachable braided imitation leather belt.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Tier on the skirt for added width.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Balconette bra in lace with lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved jersey tops made from organic cotton.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling. Unlined, drawstring hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the hem.
High-waisted lace and microfibre briefs. Wide elastication at the waist with an opening at the back, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and removable insoles, and chunky soles.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Patterned bikini. Top with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Matching bottoms with a lined gusset.
Boxy-style T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck front and back and 3/4-length sleeves.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.

Shoulder bag in rubber with a taped zip and two handles at the top, and an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap. One outer compartment with a taped zip and two inner compartments, one in mesh with a zip. Lined. Size 17x37x39 cm.
Trainers with hook and loop fasteners at the top and a lightly padded edge around the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on each sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

V-neck blouse in a soft viscose weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and fastening with covered buttons at one side. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam and flounce at the hem.

Blouse in woven fabric with ties at the back of the neck, stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist and flare to the hem with slits in the sides.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Leather and suede bag with an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One small outer compartment with a zip and two smaller inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 14x20x27 cm.
